text: John S. Konesky (born November 19, 1980) is an American guitarist, record producer, and occasional actor. ==Other websites== * Tenacious D Official website * Trainwreck Official website * Trainwreck on Myspace * An interview with John Spiker and John Konesky (under the pseudonyms of Boy Johnny and John Bartholomew Shredman) Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Columbus, Ohio
title: John Konesky
